#summary Toolbox 9.0.3 patches.

= Toolbox 9.0.3 patches =

In this page we report all the patches created for version 9.0.3 of the Toolbox

= Patch 0.1 =

Bugs Fixed:

1. WS-Addressing namespace wrong in the response of secured asynchronous operation.

2. Bug fixed on "Add WPS processing" interface.

A patch to solve these problems has been created and can be downloaded [http://toolboxenvironment.googlecode.com/files/TOOLBOX_PATCH_3.0.1.zip here].

Download the package and follow these instructions:

  # Stop Tomcat
  # Copy the package in the Tomcat webapps directory. 
  # Unzip the package. 
  # Restart Tomcat
